explains: v. 把……编成旅（或大队）；使结合，与……有联系

sentences.en: The fire brigade were there in minutes.
sentences.cn: 几分钟后消防队就到了现场。

sentences.en: A third brigade is at sea, ready for an amphibious assault.
sentences.cn: 第三旅在海上待命，随时准备从海上发起进攻。

sentences.en: On hearing the alarm the fire brigade rushed to the scene.
